text: Idea - it’d be nice to be able to copy a group of fields from one module to another, and to give even more control, it’d be cool to be able to do that across portals. Maybe one easy method to make it possible is to have a “generate field json” and an “import field json” so we’d just copy and paste the json across and it’d add new fields based on that json
To whoever at HubSpot who has the power to make this happen i say:
